featured.text: One reason the earthquake caused such damage was that Bam's buildings were made mostly from baked mud.
With such support, spiritual leader Ayatollah Ali Khamenei vowed, “We will rebuild Bam stronger than before.” 45.
Bam was best known for its 2,000-year-old castle built out of mud, straw, and the trunks of palm trees.
What was Bam most famous for? (A) Beautiful palm trees.
Bam once blossomed as a trading post on the Silk Road.

other.text: The castle was so big that it was once the city of Bam itself.
Bam was a city of mud-brick houses, old monuments and an ancient castle.
Which of the following is CORRECT about the earthquake in Bam? (A) About 50,000 people survived the earthquake.

definition.zh_def: 一種表示突然或強烈的聲音或動作的擬聲詞。
definition.en_def: An exclamation used to indicate a sudden impact or action, often associated with a loud noise.
definition.example: He hit the ball, and bam! It flew over the fence.
